text: Hey <@U07RWCAFZT3> Just use something similar to this inside of an Island `return <Form fieldPath="formGroup.formField" />`

Hello everyone!
Is there a way to conditional fields in fields.jsx?? depending on a choice field show one field or other as we did with the regular modules in the design manager?

I think my issue has to do with it being inside a modal that is not initially mounted to the DOM and not the island.
It works fine for me if its directly rendered inside an island. Thanks <@U07FG3XCBC6>
Yeah, it should behave the same way ... i.e. you can you the `visibility` prop on any field to add logic which will control when it is vsible.
<@UAYBXDG4U> <@U04DLJH3W94> Is there a way around rendering a HubSpot form inside a modal? :pray:
minor but interesting bug: when proxying a page an `emdash` won't render properly. It renders as *`publications&mdash;and`* instead of `*`publications—and``*
It's coming from a field value. Do I need to "render" it in some special way on the react side? I don't I've had to do that before but I guess it's possible I haven't run into this before
